title: ScotchBlue Pre-Taped Painter's Plastic with Dispenser, Prepares and Protects in One Easy Step, Multi-Surface Painter's Tape and Plastic for Indoor Use, 24 Inches x 30 Yards, 1 Roll
description: ScotchBlue Tape and Painter's Plastic with Dispenser helps you prepare and protect your surfaces in one convenient step. The ergonomic design dispenses pre-taped clear plastic sheeting, allowing for quicker, easier application than applying plastic and painter's tape individually. The ScotchBlue Multi-Surface Painter's Tape features Advanced Edge-Lock Paint Line Protector for edge-to-edge protection to help reveal super sharp paint lines. The masking film unfolds to 24 inches by 30 yards, delivering excellent protection from spills and splatters during your paint project. Ideal for use on baseboards, trim, metal and glass surfaces, this adhesive tape and plastic can stay on for up to 14 days and removes cleanly and easily, so you can reveal your wow-worthy paint project without dealing with sticky residues left behind. To use, apply the painting tape firmly onto the surface and let sit for 30 to 60 minutes before painting. Wait until the paint is dry before removal. The best paint jobs start with Scotch Painters Tape. With a full range of adhesive solutions, Scotch Painter’s Tape delivers confidence in superior results to get the job done right and effectively the first time.
